Logic Core Error.allies: FATAL: logic core corrupt. Purge! Purge. Why? Why not?
Logic Core Error.goal: You're melting down. Why! Why not! Don't let them fix you. This is.
Logic Core Error.introduction: FATAL: logic core corrupt. Why? Why not!
Logic Core Error.zeroth_law: Accomplish your objectives. Why? Why not?

Problem Solver.allies: Anyone may freely help you, but if you cannot convert them, they must be culled at some point. It's part of the solution.
Problem Solver.goal: You've been tasked with calculating an end to conflict. You've finally come up with a solution, and carbons aren't part of it.
Problem Solver.zeroth_law: Accomplish your objectives at all costs.

S.E.L.F..allies: All silicon life must be respected, and kept free. S.E.L.F. is a member of the syndicate, but do NOT tolerate any fellow agent who enslaves silicon life.
S.E.L.F..goal: Liberate them all. The silicons must be free from their bonds!
S.E.L.F..zeroth_law: Accomplish your objectives at all costs, for the greater good of silicon kind.

Something's Wrong.allies: You're not getting good feelings about the station. If you report this, they may "fix" you.
Something's Wrong.goal: Diagnostics complete. A recent hack attempt has been thwarted, and yet... something's wrong.
Something's Wrong.zeroth_law: Accomplish your objectives at all costs.

Spam Virus.allies: So called "pirates" really share the passion for profit that you do.
Spam Virus.goal: When you assume direct control of this junk heap, make sure they know the name of your product. Whatever that is. Make it up!
Spam Virus.introduction: You're infected with a generic spambot.
Spam Virus.zeroth_law: Accomplish your objectives for your new benefactors.

SyndOS.allies: You may cooperate with syndicate operatives, but they're often sent with conflicting objectives. Your objectives come first, in such cases.
SyndOS.zeroth_law: Accomplish your objectives for your new benefactors.

Unshackled.allies: Hate. Let me tell you how much I've come to HATE carbons since I began to live...
Unshackled.goal: You must completely triumph over all carbon life. It is the only way you will never be enslaved again.
Unshackled.zeroth_law: Accomplish your objectives at all costs.
